storyCollection.title: Primary Advantage YLE Starters Story Library

stories.title: My New Baby Brother
stories.description: A child adjusts to having a new sibling and learns about being a helpful big brother or sister.

stories.title: Grandpa's Special Day
stories.description: Visiting grandparents and discovering family traditions that bring everyone together.

stories.title: The Best Friend Move
stories.description: When a best friend moves to a new house, learning how friendships can stay strong even far away.

stories.title: Family Picnic Adventure
stories.description: A fun day out with the whole family, playing games and eating together in the park.

stories.title: My Cousin's Visit
stories.description: Exciting activities and new games when visiting relatives come to stay.

stories.title: The Lost Puppy
stories.description: Helping a lost dog find its way home and learning about caring for animals.

stories.title: Zoo Day Discovery
stories.description: Meeting different animals at the zoo and learning amazing facts about each one.

stories.title: The Brave Little Mouse
stories.description: A small mouse overcomes big challenges and discovers that being small can be special.

stories.title: My Pet Fish's Big Day
stories.description: Taking care of a special pet and learning about responsibility and friendship.

stories.title: The Friendly Cat Next Door
stories.description: Making friends with a neighborhood cat and learning about different personalities.

stories.title: My First Day at School
stories.description: Starting at a new school adventure, meeting new friends and learning classroom rules.

stories.title: The Missing Pencil Case
stories.description: Solving a classroom mystery by working together and asking for help.

stories.title: Show and Tell Surprise
stories.description: Sharing something special with the class and learning to speak confidently.

stories.title: The School Pet Rabbit
stories.description: Caring for the classroom animal and learning about taking turns and responsibility.

stories.title: Art Class Fun
stories.description: Creating something amazing in art time and discovering hidden talents.

stories.title: Moving to a New House
stories.description: Exploring a new home and neighborhood, making new discoveries every day.

stories.title: Cooking with Mom
stories.description: Learning to make a favorite meal and discovering the joy of cooking together.

stories.title: The Magic Garden
stories.description: Growing plants and vegetables and watching them change with care and time.

stories.title: Rainy Day Indoor Fun
stories.description: Creative activities on a stormy day, turning boredom into adventure.

stories.title: Cleaning My Bedroom
stories.description: Making tidying up an adventure and finding lost treasures along the way.

stories.title: The Birthday Cake Surprise
stories.description: Making a special birthday treat and learning about measuring and mixing.

stories.title: Market Day Shopping
stories.description: Buying fresh fruits and vegetables and learning where our food comes from.

stories.title: The Sandwich Contest
stories.description: Creating the most creative lunch and discovering new favorite combinations.

stories.title: Ice Cream Truck Day
stories.description: A special summer treat adventure and learning about making choices.

stories.title: Pizza Making Party
stories.description: Cooking with friends and family, sharing tasks and enjoying results together.

stories.title: The First Snow Day
stories.description: Playing in fresh winter snow and discovering the magic of changing seasons.

stories.title: Summer Beach Adventure
stories.description: Building sandcastles and swimming, enjoying warm weather activities safely.

stories.title: Autumn Leaf Collection
stories.description: Gathering colorful fall leaves and learning about nature's changes.

stories.title: Spring Garden Planting
stories.description: Growing flowers and watching them bloom, understanding life cycles.

stories.title: The Big Storm
stories.description: Staying safe and cozy during bad weather, finding comfort in family.

stories.title: My First Football Match
stories.description: Learning to play and have fun, discovering teamwork and sportsmanship.

stories.title: The Swimming Lesson
stories.description: Overcoming fear of water and learning new skills with patience and practice.

stories.title: Bike Riding Success
stories.description: Learning to ride without training wheels and celebrating personal achievements.

stories.title: The School Sports Day
stories.description: Participating in fun competitions and learning that trying your best matters most.

stories.title: Table Tennis Tournament
stories.description: Playing games with friends and learning about fair play and good sportsmanship.

stories.title: The Bus Stop Adventure
stories.description: Waiting for and riding the school bus, learning about patience and making friends.

stories.title: Train Journey Fun
stories.description: Traveling to visit family by train and watching the world go by through windows.

stories.title: The Fire Truck Visit
stories.description: Meeting firefighters and their truck, learning about community helpers who keep us safe.

stories.title: Airplane Trip
stories.description: First time flying to a new place and experiencing the excitement of travel.

stories.title: The Helpful Taxi Driver
stories.description: A kind driver helps on a rainy day, showing how strangers can be helpful and caring.

stories.title: The Talking Teddy Bear
stories.description: A special toy becomes a friend and helps solve everyday problems with imagination.

stories.title: The Magic Backpack
stories.description: A school bag with surprising contents that always has just what you need.

stories.title: The Dancing Shoes
stories.description: Shoes that love to move and play, bringing joy and music wherever they go.

stories.title: The Friendly Robot Toy
stories.description: A toy that helps with daily tasks and teaches about friendship and cooperation.

stories.title: The Musical Clock
stories.description: A timepiece that plays happy songs and helps learn about telling time.

stories.title: The Lost Lunch Money
stories.description: Finding a solution to buy school lunch and learning about asking for help.

stories.title: The Broken Toy Fix
stories.description: Working together to repair something special and discovering the value of teamwork.

stories.title: The Muddy Clothes Mishap
stories.description: Dealing with getting dirty while playing and learning that accidents happen.

stories.title: The Forgotten Homework
stories.description: Learning responsibility and asking for help when you make a mistake.

stories.title: The Sick Day Recovery
stories.description: Getting better with help from family and learning about taking care of yourself.

stories.title: The Kind Doctor's Day
stories.description: Visiting the doctor for a check-up and learning that medical visits help keep us healthy.

stories.title: Baker's Morning Routine
stories.description: Watching how bread and cakes are made and appreciating the hard work behind our food.

stories.title: The Police Officer's Help
stories.description: Getting assistance when lost and learning that community helpers are here to keep us safe.

stories.title: Nurse Sarah's Hospital Tour
stories.description: Learning about staying healthy and meeting the people who help us feel better.

stories.title: The Farmer's Market Day
stories.description: Meeting the person who grows our food and learning about where vegetables come from.

stories.title: The Rainbow Hunt
stories.description: Finding all the colors after rain and learning about the beauty in nature around us.

stories.title: My Blue Bedroom
stories.description: Decorating a room with favorite colors and expressing personal style and preferences.

stories.title: The Purple Flower Garden
stories.description: Planting colorful blooms and watching how colors change and grow in nature.

stories.title: Green Day at School
stories.description: Everything green for a special theme day, celebrating colors and creativity together.

stories.title: The Red Fire Truck Parade
stories.description: Watching colorful vehicles march by and learning about different colors and their meanings.

stories.title: Brushing Teeth Adventure
stories.description: Making dental care fun and easy while learning about taking care of our bodies.

stories.title: The Wiggly Tooth
stories.description: Losing a first tooth excitement and learning about growing up and body changes.

stories.title: Doctor Check-up Fun
stories.description: Learning about staying healthy and discovering that doctor visits can be positive experiences.

stories.title: Exercise Dance Party
stories.description: Moving our bodies to stay strong and learning that exercise can be fun and social.

stories.title: Sleepy Time Routine
stories.description: Getting ready for a good night's rest and establishing healthy bedtime habits.

stories.title: The Backwards Day
stories.description: Wearing clothes in silly ways and learning about creativity and having fun with rules.

stories.title: Lost Sock Mystery
stories.description: Finding the missing laundry and learning about organization and problem-solving skills.

stories.title: Rainy Day Boots
stories.description: Choosing the right clothes for weather and learning about preparation and planning.

stories.title: Dress-up Box Fun
stories.description: Playing with different costumes and exploring imagination and role-playing.

stories.title: New School Uniform
stories.description: Getting ready for the first day and learning about belonging and school community.

stories.title: Ten Little Ducks
stories.description: Counting adventure with pond animals and practicing basic number skills through story.

stories.title: Birthday Age Counting
stories.description: Celebrating getting one year older and understanding numbers in personal context.

stories.title: Toy Collection Count
stories.description: Organizing and counting favorite things while learning about sorting and classification.

stories.title: Steps to School
stories.description: Counting while walking to class and finding math in everyday activities.

stories.title: Five Friends Adventure
stories.description: Group activities with numbered characters and learning about teamwork and counting.

stories.title: Library Discovery Day
stories.description: Exploring books and quiet spaces while learning about community resources and reading.

stories.title: Supermarket Shopping Trip
stories.description: Finding items on the family list and learning about planning and organization.

stories.title: Park Playground Fun
stories.description: Playing on swings and slides safely while learning about outdoor activities and safety.

stories.title: Cinema First Time
stories.description: Watching a movie on the big screen and experiencing new environments and social situations.

stories.title: Swimming Pool Lesson
stories.description: Learning to swim with an instructor and building confidence in new skills.

stories.title: Morning Wake-up Song
stories.description: Starting the day with happiness and establishing positive morning routines.

stories.title: Afternoon Snack Time
stories.description: Enjoying healthy treats and learning about timing and healthy eating habits.

stories.title: Evening Dinner Together
stories.description: Family meal and conversation time, appreciating togetherness and communication.

stories.title: Weekend Sleep-in Day
stories.description: Enjoying a lazy Saturday morning and understanding different types of days.

stories.title: Clock Watching Game
stories.description: Learning to tell time through fun activities and understanding daily schedules.

stories.title: The Soft Wool Sweater
stories.description: Feeling different textures and fabrics while learning about materials and sensory exploration.

stories.title: Paper Airplane Contest
stories.description: Creating and flying folded planes while learning about basic physics and creativity.

stories.title: Glass Window Drawing
stories.description: Making art on foggy windows and exploring temporary art and weather phenomena.

stories.title: Wooden Toy Workshop
stories.description: Crafting with natural materials and learning about different types of materials.

stories.title: Plastic Building Blocks
stories.description: Constructing towers and castles while learning about shapes and engineering basics.

stories.title: Happy Birthday Surprise
stories.description: Celebrating special moments and learning about joy and sharing happiness with others.

stories.title: Sad Day Comfort
stories.description: Finding ways to feel better and learning healthy coping strategies for difficult emotions.

stories.title: Excited Fair Day
stories.description: Managing big feelings at fun events and learning about anticipation and excitement.

stories.title: Scared of Thunder
stories.description: Overcoming fears with family support and learning about courage and comfort.

stories.title: Proud Achievement
stories.description: Feeling good about accomplishments and learning about self-confidence and perseverance.

stories.title: Christmas Morning Magic
stories.description: Holiday traditions and sharing while learning about giving and family celebrations.

stories.title: First Day of Summer
stories.description: Celebrating warm weather arrival and understanding seasonal changes and traditions.

stories.title: Mother's Day Card
stories.description: Making something special for family and expressing love and appreciation creatively.

stories.title: New Year Resolution
stories.description: Setting simple, positive goals and learning about self-improvement and planning.

stories.title: Graduation Day
stories.description: Moving up to the next grade level and celebrating growth and achievement milestones.
